Term.Name: Category Type
Term.Definition: The value of the CategoryType property hints the client on how to render the screen.

Term.Name: SeriesContainer
Term.Definition: A category that contains only series objects

Term.Name: Hidden
Term.Definition: Defines that this category should not be displayed in the Dawn UI.

Term.Name: Screen Content
Term.Definition: The property defines the link to RENTED screen under Saved section in HZN4 UI.

Term.Name: Rent
Term.Definition: Defines ‘RENTED’ area in the VoD section to be linked under Saved Section.

Term.Name: Promotions
Term.Definition: This property defines the editorial promotion to be displayed together with Main Menu.

Term.Name: Screen Layout
Term.Definition: The property can be used to define the screen layout of the content in the category or the screen.

Term.Name: Collection screen
Term.Definition: A collection is a horizontal row of Tiles that are grouped by at least 1 common attribute. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/display/HZN4/Collection

Term.Name: Tile screen
Term.Definition: Tiles are focusable and selectable 'rectangles' representing either assets/series, people and content areas or similar entry points to content. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/display/HZN4/Tile

Term.Name: Grid screen
Term.Definition: Grid pages are filterable pages containing all items that fall under a specified common nominator. This common nominator can either be a section, a editorial collection, folder or recommendation query. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=47646152

Term.Name: Editorial Grid screen
Term.Definition: https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=47646152#Gridpage(template)-4.3EditorialGrid

Term.Name: Branded Grid screen
Term.Definition: https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=47646152#Gridpage(template)-4.2BrandedGrid

Term.Name: Multi Product Package screen
Term.Definition: Multi product packages offer a group of titles as a package that can be purchased as one. The package itself can be reached by selecting a related editorial or promotion editorial or promotion tile. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=49382227

Term.Name: Details screen
Term.Definition: This template is used for various detail pages which provide the basic information and available actions for the content. The info and data displayed is specific to the content this page represents, and the layout can differ depending on the source/type of the content. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=47646722

Term.Name: New (sub) section level
Term.Definition: This is the top horizontal menu that allows navigating between sections (sub-areas) https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/display/HZN4/Section+Navigation+-+OneMW

Term.Name: Contextual menu
Term.Definition: This property defines the contextual menu configuration for MOVIES and SERIES.

Term.Name: Playout
Term.Definition: This property is only used for Promotions. When defined, UI will link to the VoD playout of the title of the promotion.

Term.Name: Collection Layout
Term.Definition: The collection screen can contain different kind of collections. A category that represents a collection must define the type of layout to use for the content. This must be done using the CollectionLayout custom property that can be set on a category. https://wikiprojects.upc.biz/display/HZN4/Collections+-+OneMW

Term.Name: Combined Collection
Term.Definition: The combined collection allows the combination of multiple collections of the same kind to be combined to one single collection. This allows to display content from different sources within a row.

Term.Name: Basic Collection
Term.Definition: This collection can either be filled with editorial content or via smart node or via the recommendations or top lists

Term.Name: Grid Collection
Term.Definition: The grid collection is very similar to a Basic Collection, but always has a Grid Entry Tile as first tile.

Term.Name: Tile Collection
Term.Definition: Single items in the collection, which can have different shapes/meanings and references.

Term.Name: Character Collection
Term.Definition: TBD

Term.Name: Promotion Collection
Term.Definition: Promotion Collections, just like Editorial Collections, contain editorial content only. This means that the content is hand assigned to the collection.

Term.Name: Promotional Spot Collection
Term.Definition: Promotional Spot Collections, can be configured to promote series (shows or seasons) and it can also be configured to link to Grid Screen.

Term.Name: Content Type
Term.Definition: The content in a collections is by default handled as regular categories with titles or series. For collections that require special handling by the CPE and/or contain content from different sources we create the ContentType Custom Node property to define how to handle the collection.

Term.Name: Editorial
Term.Definition: This can either be content of regular categories of content of categories set up as a smart node

Term.Name: Suggested
Term.Definition: Fill with personalized recommendations from the whole catalogue. If the customer has opted-out, will return non-personalized recommendations.

Term.Name: Suggested From
Term.Definition: Fill with personalized recommendations from a specific category including all of its sub-categories. If the customer has opted-out, will return non-personalized recommendations.

Term.Name: Related To Title
Term.Definition: Fill with recommendations that are related to a specific title.

Term.Name: Related To Title From
Term.Definition: Fill with recommendations that are related to a specific title, but limited in scope to a specific category

Term.Name: Related To Title For Genre
Term.Definition: Fill with recommendations that are related to a specific title, but limited in scope to title’s genre/subgenre.

Term.Name: Suggested For Genre
Term.Definition: Fill with personalized recommendations that are related to a specific genre.

Term.Name: Suggested For Genre From
Term.Definition: Fill with personalized recommendations that are related to a specific genre. The genre to be used as reference is the genre of the title that is placed in this category.

Term.Name: Top List
Term.Definition: Fill the category with the assets from a recommendation Top List.

Term.Name: Paused Items
Term.Definition: Collection with paused items

Term.Name: Continue Watching
Term.Definition: Collection with continue watching items

Term.Name: Purchased Items
Term.Definition: Collection with purchased items

Term.Name: Watch List
Term.Definition: Collection with items added to the watch list

Term.Name: Watch List Titles
Term.Definition: NOT SUPPORTED

Term.Name: Watch List Series
Term.Definition: NOT SUPPORTED

Term.Name: Default Client Sort Direction
Term.Definition: defines the sort direction as either ascending or descending.

Term.Name: Ascending
Term.Definition: Sort from low to high, depending on the sort field. This is the default for all sort types except for BroadcastDate.

Term.Name: Descending
Term.Definition: Sort from high to low. This is the default for BroadcastDate sorting.

Term.Name: Top List ID
Term.Definition: When defining a category as a TopList collection, we also have to specify which Top List to use.

Term.Name: Max Items
Term.Definition: When defining a basic or grid collection, this property can be used to limit the maximal number of items to be displayed in the collection and corresponding grid screen.

Term.Name: Exclude Options
Term.Definition: This property will be only used in Grid Screen categories to exclude filter options: Last chance and/or new arrivals.
